name: Long Live
description:
This is a game all about how fast you can destroy the people and environment. The goal is to have a low population and high points.The way you can do this is by using the disaster(s). When in game you can use the left click to set a fire. The fire will spread and you will gain points.When the houses catch fire and burn down the people living in them will die and your population will go down. The game will start as soon as you hit play. You have 1 minute to do as much destruction as possible.

I plan to update this game and work with it after LD so follow me on twitter @ieyfo to see what is new in it.

THIS GAME WAS MADE FOR #LD37 Compo
